website_summaries.verdict: While not without its share of photo and performance issues, the GE E1410SW is a fine ultracompact megazoom snapshooter for those on a budget.
pros: The GE E1410SW puts a wide-angle 10x zoom lens in an ultracompact package for an affordable price
It also has some nice extra shooting features you'd find on more expensive cameras in its class
cons: The E1410SW isn't great for low-light or indoor shooting
Its flash turns on automatically every time you start the camera or change shooting modes, which slows performance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phoneless Camera
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera. I tell people that this is my "Phoneless Camera"...many seem amazed to learn they make cameras without phones. Been very pleased at ease of use and wide range of tools available. I would like to see a better manual or on-line guide to location and use of settings. (Are you reading this GE?)Takes excellent pics, much easier and better than those cameras that have phones. Besides, what if the phone rings just as you about to snap that one-in-lifetime shot?
customer_reviews.author: Metajohn

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for a super cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for a super cheap price. I like the macro mode and the ability to focus on things as close as 1 cm. The auto white balance is great for taking pictures in various lighting situations. It is perfect for those situations where your smartphone camera just wont do.
customer_reviews.author: nathan s

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Dad, found out it stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad, found out it stopped working after about two uses after I asked him why he wasn't using it instead of his phone. Turns out this is a re a curing problem with these cameras.

customer_reviews.title: Camera phone better but it's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, has lots of options, but I bought a better camera with worse stats years ago. Just the quality I guess. It works for what I need anyway, but I actually prefer the camera on my phone for sharpness in my photos and good light balance.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty McCole

customer_reviews.title: Great little Point & Shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these cameras take great snapshots. The LCD is large enough to see and the built-in 10x optical zoom is great. It's also small enough to easily carry around with you. I've owned/used several GE (point and shoot) digital cameras. Comparatively, they seem to do a better job than more expensive priced cameras of other brands, with similar features.
customer_reviews.author: JI

customer_reviews.title: Sure Shots
customer_reviews.text: Work as designed. Bought three for my grandsons to use on a family vacation. They enjoyed them except tor the batteries running down so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera! I am no photographer and I got some amazing photos on a recent trip overseas. The camera is easy to use, has great features and records videos well. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: guinnessgirl64

customer_reviews.title: This sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the camera for 2 months and now I am seeing marks on every picture. I can't see anything on the screen, but it shows up on every picture.
customer_reviews.author: GermanShep1

customer_reviews.title: didnt last
customer_reviews.text: works great for the price.... update .......lasted about a year and it died....says lens obstruction.....
customer_reviews.author: Greg Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes awesome pictures, wish the video had better image stabilization , otherwise good feeling!
customer_reviews.author: cj jones

customer_reviews.title: ... is not what i expected this brand is not recommended, photos are ok but the quality is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera is not what i expected this brand is not recommended, photos are ok but the quality is not as good as described. The time between photos and photos is not acceptable. Is not that bad for the price anyway so i gave it 4 stars. Ahhh nights shots are not good also... Ciao
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: I like the camera and price
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how long it will last. As low as the price was several months would be excellent. Really nice 10 power lens lets me get good mountain and eagle shots.
customer_reviews.author: purchaser 1

customer_reviews.title: Camera and Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it used AAA or AA rechargeable batteries instead of card type battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sale price was right and the quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Simmons

customer_reviews.title: easy for even an 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for my little buddy he's 8 an loves it an figured out how to operate it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: mark harmon

customer_reviews.title: Dropped it like half a foot and it broke the lense
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a very short amount of time. Dropped it like half a foot and it broke the lense. Not that great. It also makes a weird sound when recording videos which I do slot for YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mansell

customer_reviews.title: The camera has a very annoying defect in the button click
customer_reviews.text: The camera has a very annoying defect in the button click ... it's very hard to drive it and I lost many important photos to take me to drive it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilver Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera! But i failed to know when i had gotten it that 1. The battery will die on you unless you take it out and store it somewhere. I stored the camera for a good few months. Tried to charge it one day and it didnt turn on AT. ALL. So here i am now reordering a new Li-ion battery for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Aanonsen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT an expensive camera. Nevertheless, I have certain expectations that were not met. My complaints are that the color doesn't seem true and it takes a long time start up or to reset between photos. I would not recommend this for purchase. I had another GE camera before this one and loved it til I dropped and broke it. That model is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: MEK

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera to carry around with me without having the hassle of a huge DSLR. This camera blew me away. I only paid around $50 for it so I wasn't expecting much. This little camera over-delivered. The quality of the photos is excellent. The 14.4 MP and the CMOS sensor really shine. The pre-programmed settings are good and manual mode allows me all kinds of control of my shots. This camera was a pleasant surprise when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Zach K.

customer_reviews.title: Audible crackling while video recording
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera with the hope of taking decent 1080p video, however after 2 cameras (each from "different batches") i gave up on this camera. There is some VERY audible crackling sound when taking video. I believe it is due to the noisy autofocus. It takes decent photos though. Just don't expect it to take good videos.
customer_reviews.author: albert

product_meta.title: General Imaging Full-HD Digital Camera with 14.4MP, CMOS, 10X Optical Zoom, 3-Inch LCD, 28mm wide angle Lens, and HDMI (Gold) E1410SW-CP
product_meta.description:
GE Power Series E1410SW Digital Camera features advanced Aptina A-Pix CMOS pixel technology for high performance 14MP, high speed continuous shot, image blending, improved Full-HD 1080p video and low light 3200 ISO sensitivity. Additional highlights include 10X Optical Zoom, 3.0"LCD, 28mm Wide Angle Lens, HDMI Output, Optical Image Stabilization, Object Tracking, Shutter Priority mode, Program mode, Auto Scene, Face Beauty, Pan-capture Panorama, Smile & Blink Detection, Face Auto Exposure, Red-eye Removal, High Dynamic Range, and more. Powered by LI-ion Battery.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER




Improved HDR feature blends three different exposures to create one perfect image


Click here to learn more about the advanced ways the E1410SW helps you take better pictures



The super slim and sleek Power Series E1410SW has it all. Discover the benefits of CMOS technology with features like High-Speed Continuous Shooting. Now you can capture 10 frames per second in full resolution, so you'll never miss the action. With wide-angle lens and long zoom capabilities, you can always get everyone together and keep them close. For picture-perfect results every time, the power packed E1410SW is the answer.



Equipped with 10x optical zoom and a 28mm wide angle lens housed in one of the slimmest designs available


Create your own highlight reel as every action scene becomes easy to capture in Full HD 1080p video


With multi-exposure, capture the action in six successive shots and combine them in a single photo. View larger

ULTRA SLIM BODY WITH POWERFUL ZOOM
The E1410 is equipped with 10x optical zoom and housed in one of the slimmest designs available. Slip this camera in your purse or pocket and you'll be ready for anything.

28MM WIDE ANGLE LENS
With its wide angle lens, you can capture a wider scene and more of the action than with traditional camera lenses.

FULL HD 1080P VIDEO AND HDMI OUTPUT
Create your own highlight reel as every action becomes easy to capture in Full HD 1080p video. Share your high resolution videos instantly with ultra-convenient HDMI connectivity.

THE CMOS ADVANTAGE
When image is everything, CMOS technology delivers. With features like High-Speed Continuous Shooting, Full 1080p HD and improved High Dynamic Range+ (HDR+), you'll never miss an action shot again. Combine this cutting edge performance with wide-angle, long zoom capabilities and you'll be one sharp shooter.

HIGH DYNAMIC RANGE
HDR+ (High Dynamic Range+) Photos unite. Now you never have to lose the beauty of low-light images. An improved HDR+ feature blends three different exposures, combining the most detailed portions of each to create one perfect image.

MULTI-EXPOSURE
With the ability to blend multiple images, you can finally see the whole picture. The Multi-Exposure feature captures the action in six successive shots then combines them into a single photo. Just one button and you're on your way.

FACE AUTO-EXPOSURE
GE's Face AE detects human faces and automatically adjusts camera settings for the best the exposure. When taking photos under dark shade or in backlit conditions, portrait shots still come out perfectly.

OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZATION
The optical image stabilization automatically adjusts for unintentional camera movements, giving you crisp, clear pictures every time.

PANCAPTURE
With most cameras, "panoramic" means standing way back from your subject while it cuts off the top and bottom of the photo. With the Pancapture feature, a true single panoramic picture requires only one press of the shutter button and you panning the camera across the shot. The E1410SW automatically takes the remaining 2 shots, then seamlessly stitches them together.

AUTO SCENE
Close ups? Low lighting? With Auto Scene Detection, the camera surveys the lighting and environment and automatically sets the exposure for the sharpest, most vibrant pictures possible. You get to concentrate on capturing the moment while the camera does the heavy lifting.

OBJECT TRACKING
Moving targets are no problem with this cool feature. The GE High Speed Object Tracking Mode lets you target, track, and automatically focus on your subject. For action shots, there's no better way to go.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
GE E1410SW Camera, rechargeable Lithium-ion battery, AC adapter, USB cable, neck strap, CD-ROM, manual, quick start guide, feature guide, warranty card.



High Speed Tracking Mode lets you target, track, and automatically focus on your subject

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Active Image Sensor Pixels: 14.4 Megapixels
 * Image Sensor: 15.1 Megapixels [1/2.3" (Aptina A-Pix CMOS pixel technology)]
 * Lens Optical Zoom: 10x
 * Focal Length: 5.0 mm (Wide) - 50 mm (Tele)
 * 35mm Film Equivalent: 28 mm (Wide) - 280 mm (Tele)
 * F Number: f/3.2 (Wide) - f/5.6 (Tele)
 * Lens Construction: 12 elements in 8 groups
 * Shooting Modes: Auto P, S, Manual, Face Beautifier, Scene [ASCN, Portrait, Sport, Landscape, Children, Indoor, Leaf, Branch, Text, Party, ID, Fisheye, Panning Shot, Photo Frame, Sketch, Snow, Sunset, Fireworks, Glass, Museum, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Multi-Exposure, Pet (cat), Pet (dog)], Panorama and Movie
 * Focusing Range: Normal: (Wide) 23.6" ~8/60 cm ~8, (Tele) 39.4" ~8/100 cm ~8; Macro: (Wide) 1.9" ~8/5.0 cm ~8
 * Still Image: 14MP: 4320x3240, (3:2) 12MP: 4320x2880, (16:9) 10MP: 4320x2432, 8MP: 3264x2448, 5MP: 2592x1944, 3MP: 2048x1536, 2MP 1920x1080, 0.3MP: 640x480
 * Video Resolution: 1080p 30, 720p 60, 720p 30, VGA, QVGA
 * Movie Format: MOV (H.264), Audio: ACC (Stereo)
 * Image Format: Exif 2.2 (JPEG)
 * View Angle: 0 ~ 360 degrees
 * LCD Display: 3.0 inch (230,400 Pixels) TFT-LCD
 * ISO Sensitivity: Auto, ISO 100/200/400/800/1600/3200
 * Dimensions: 3.9" x 2.2" x 0.7 ~ 1.0" (98.3 mm x 56.8 mm x 19 ~ 25.4 mm)
feature_bullets: High speed shooting that captures every exciting detail with 10 frames per second and in full resolution
Captures all of your videos in full high-definition 1080p resolution
Target, track and automatically focus on even the fastest moving objects
Automatically enhances a subject's face by softening unnatural skintones and brightening and opening the eyes
Wide-view photos are produced by panning the camera across to create a seamless panoramic picture

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars37 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
